info.name: fo_118_verify_to_create_transfer
info.description:
### Testsuite: Verify to create transfer

###### Testcase:

1. Login (F1)
    
2. Get data
    
    1. client / get list client => get 1 client to action
        
    2. transaction / get list transaction => get total
        
    3. account / get list va => get va to action
        
    4. ledger_coa / get list coa => get data
        
    5. ledger_transaction / get list ledger tnx => get data
        
    6. ledger_posting / get list posting => get data
        
3. Create transfer (payout)
    
    1. if(isExternal) call verify otp
        
4. Check data
    
    1. transfer / get transfer detail => check data
        
    2. account / get list va
        
    3. transaction / get list transaction => increase 1 or 2?, check data
        
    4. transaction / get transaction detail => data correctly
        
    5. ledger_transaction / get list ledger tnx => data increase 1
        
    6. ledger_posting / get list posting => data increase respective
        

###### Note:
